fortuneStacks.name: Fortune Stacks
fortuneStacks.hint: If true (default), multiple fortunes/misfortunes from different sources will stack. So you could potentially end up with 4d20kh. If false, then multiple fortunes/misfortunes will only go to a max of two dice. Multiple misfortune and fortunes affecting the same roll will cancel out (e.g. 3 differnt fortunes vs 2 different misfortunes means you are "more fortunate" and will be rolling with a bonus. If you have an equal number of fortune vs misfortune, then you "break even" and roll normally.)
